accurate_docstring: When in morningFactoryStartup, monitor the status of machine M1, start production line L1, and optimize factory energy usage. When in afternoonFactoryOperations, monitor the status of machine M2, run production line L2, and alert maintenance for machine M3. When in nightFactoryShutdown, stop production lines L1 and L2, optimize factory energy usage, and monitor the status of machine M3.
template_docstring: WHEN in morningFactoryStartup, DO monitor the status of machine M1; start production line L1; optimize factory energy usage; WHEN in afternoonFactoryOperations, DO monitor the status of machine M2; run production line L2; alert maintenance for machine M3; WHEN in nightFactoryShutdown, DO stop production lines L1 and L2; optimize factory energy usage; monitor the status of machine M3.

accurate_docstring: When in the morningFactoryRoutine, monitor the status of machine1. If the machine needs maintenance, perform maintenance on machine1. Notify the maintenance team that the morning factory machine check is completed. When in the afternoonFactoryRoutine, monitor the status of machine2. If the machine is overheating, perform maintenance on machine2. Notify the maintenance team that the afternoon factory machine check is completed. When in the eveningFactoryRoutine, monitor the status of machine3. If the machine has low efficiency, perform maintenance on machine3. Notify the maintenance team that the evening factory machine check is completed.
template_docstring: WHEN in the morningFactoryRoutine, DO monitor the status of machine1; IF the machine needs maintenance, THEN perform maintenance on machine1; notify the maintenance team that the morning factory machine check is completed; WHEN in the afternoonFactoryRoutine, DO monitor the status of machine2; IF the machine is overheating, THEN perform maintenance on machine2; notify the maintenance team that the afternoon factory machine check is completed; WHEN in the eveningFactoryRoutine, DO monitor the status of machine3; IF the machine has low efficiency, THEN perform maintenance on machine3; notify the maintenance team that the evening factory machine check is completed.

accurate_docstring: When in the morningFactoryRoutine, monitor the efficiency of machine1. If the efficiency is below 75%, schedule maintenance for machine1. Monitor the air quality in zone1. If the PM10 levels exceed 50 ppm, adjust the air filtration to high. Notify the factory manager that the morning factory routine is completed. When in the afternoonFactoryRoutine, monitor the efficiency of machine2. If the efficiency is below 80%, schedule maintenance for machine2. Monitor the air quality in zone2. If the VOC levels exceed 100 ppm, adjust the air filtration to medium. Notify the factory manager that the afternoon factory routine is completed. When in the eveningFactoryRoutine, monitor the efficiency of machine3. If the efficiency is below 85%, schedule maintenance for machine3. Monitor the air quality in zone3. If the CO2 levels exceed 800 ppm, adjust the air filtration to high. Notify the factory manager that the evening factory routine is completed.
template_docstring: WHEN in the morningFactoryRoutine, DO monitor the efficiency of machine1; IF the efficiency is below 75%, THEN schedule maintenance for machine1; monitor the air quality in zone1; IF the PM10 levels exceed 50 ppm, THEN adjust the air filtration to high; notify the factory manager that the morning factory routine is completed; WHEN in the afternoonFactoryRoutine, DO monitor the efficiency of machine2; IF the efficiency is below 80%, THEN schedule maintenance for machine2; monitor the air quality in zone2; IF the VOC levels exceed 100 ppm, THEN adjust the air filtration to medium; notify the factory manager that the afternoon factory routine is completed; WHEN in the eveningFactoryRoutine, DO monitor the efficiency of machine3; IF the efficiency is below 85%, THEN schedule maintenance for machine3; monitor the air quality in zone3; IF the CO2 levels exceed 800 ppm, THEN adjust the air filtration to high; notify the factory manager that the evening factory routine is completed.

accurate_docstring: When in the morningFactoryRoutine, monitor the efficiency of production line1. If the efficiency is below 75%, schedule maintenance for line1. Monitor the air quality in zone1. If PM10 levels are above 50, adjust the air filtration to high. Monitor the raw material stock for steel. If the stock is below 100 units, reorder 500 units of steel. Notify the factory manager that the morning factory routine is completed. In the afternoonFactoryRoutine, monitor the efficiency of production line2. If the efficiency is below 80%, schedule maintenance for line2. Monitor the air quality in zone2. If VOC levels are above 100, adjust the air filtration to medium. Monitor the raw material stock for plastic. If the stock is below 200 units, reorder 600 units of plastic. Notify the factory manager that the afternoon factory routine is completed. In the eveningFactoryRoutine, monitor the efficiency of production line3. If the efficiency is below 85%, schedule maintenance for line3. Monitor the air quality in zone3. If CO2 levels are above 800, adjust the air filtration to high. Monitor the raw material stock for glass. If the stock is below 150 units, reorder 700 units of glass. Notify the factory manager that the evening factory routine is completed.
template_docstring: WHEN in the morningFactoryRoutine, DO monitor the efficiency of production line1; IF the efficiency is below 75%, THEN schedule maintenance for line1; monitor the air quality in zone1; IF PM10 levels are above 50, THEN adjust the air filtration to high; monitor the raw material stock for steel; IF the stock is below 100 units, THEN reorder 500 units of steel; notify the factory manager that the morning factory routine is completed; WHEN in the afternoonFactoryRoutine, DO monitor the efficiency of production line2; IF the efficiency is below 80%, THEN schedule maintenance for line2; monitor the air quality in zone2; IF VOC levels are above 100, THEN adjust the air filtration to medium; monitor the raw material stock for plastic; IF the stock is below 200 units, THEN reorder 600 units of plastic; notify the factory manager that the afternoon factory routine is completed; WHEN in the eveningFactoryRoutine, DO monitor the efficiency of production line3; IF the efficiency is below 85%, THEN schedule maintenance for line3; monitor the air quality in zone3; IF CO2 levels are above 800, THEN adjust the air filtration to high; monitor the raw material stock for glass; IF the stock is below 150 units, THEN reorder 700 units of glass; notify the factory manager that the evening factory routine is completed.
